question: Will Terry McLaurin leave the Commanders before Week 1?
description:
This is a polymarket to predict whether Terry McLaurin will be traded or released by the Washington Commanders and signed by another NFL team before the start of Week 1 of the 2025 NFL regular season.

This market will resolve to “Yes” if official confirmation is reported that Terry McLaurin has either: been traded by the Washington Commanders to another NFL franchise, or been released by the Commanders and subsequently signed by another NFL franchise before September 7, 2025, at 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, it will resolve to “No”.

Trades or signings publicly reported before the resolution deadline will qualify, even if McLaurin has not yet reported to or played for the new team.

The primary resolution source will be official NFL transaction logs, announcements from the Washington Commanders, or a consensus of credible reporting.

question: ATP Toronto – Zverev vs. Cerundolo
description:
This is a polymarket on the Round 4 match between Alexander Zverev and Francisco Cerúndolo in the 2025 ATP Toronto men’s singles tournament, scheduled for August 2, 2025.

This market will resolve to “Zverev” if Alexander Zverev advances against Francisco Cerúndolo.
This market will resolve to “Cerundolo” if Francisco Cerúndolo advances against Alexander Zverev.

If the match is canceled (not played at all) or ends in a tie, or if it is delayed beyond August 4, 2025, without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50–50.

If the match ends in a walkover (one player withdraws before the start and the other advances automatically), this market will resolve in favor of the player who officially advances to the next round.

The primary resolution source will be official information from the ATP Tour. A consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Leagues Cup – Orlando City vs. Atlas
description:
This market will resolve to “Orlando” if Orlando City SC defeats Atlas in their 2025 Leagues Cup Phase One match.

This market will resolve to “Atlas” if Atlas defeats Orlando City SC in their 2025 Leagues Cup Phase One match.

This market covers the outcome of the match, including 90 minutes of regulation plus stoppage time, and any penalty shootout that follows, if applicable.

If the match is not completed by August 8, 2025 (11:59 PM ET), this market will resolve to “50–50.”

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from Concacaf or MLS. A consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

description:

question: Will Bitcoin dip to $112K July 28–August 3?
description:
This market will immediately resolve to "Yes" if any Binance 1 minute candle for Bitcoin (BTC/USDT) during the date range specified in the title (from 11:00 AM ET on the first date to 11:59 PM ET on the last) has a final "Low" price equal to or lower than the price specified in the title. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No."

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the BTC/USDT "Low" prices available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT, with the chart settings on "1m" for one-minute candles selected on the top bar.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from HLTV: https://www.hltv.org/events/8038/iem-cologne-2025.

events.title: IEM Cologne: Spirit vs. MOUZ
events.description:
Spirit and MOUZ are scheduled to play each other in the IEM Cologne 2025 Tournament on August 3, 2025.

This market will resolve to “Spirit” if Spirit win against MOUZ in the best-of-3 matchup of the IEM Cologne Tournament.

This market will resolve to “MOUZ” if MOUZ win against Spirit in the best-of-3 matchup of the IEM Cologne Tournament.

if the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.

if the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from HLTV: https://www.hltv.org/events/8038/iem-cologne-2025.
